text: The Crocus City Hall () is a music venue in Krasnogorsk, Moscow Oblast. It is north-west of central Moscow, close to the Moscow Ring Road. The businessman Aras Agalarov opened it on 25 October 2009. In March 2024, it was severely damaged by an explosion during a major terrorist attack that killed at least 137 people. == References == Category:Moscow Oblast Category:Music venues Category:Buildings and structures in Russia
title: Crocus City Hall
